original_text: which went to the descendants of Aaron, one of the clans of the Kohathites who belonged to the people of Levi; since the lot fell to them first.
korean_text: 레위 자손 중 그핫 가족들에 속한 아론 자손이 첫째로 제비 뽑혔으므로

sentences.original_text: which went to the descendants of Aaron
one of the clans of the Kohathites
who belonged to the people of Levi
since the lot fell to them first
